comments: ⚠️ This address is associated with a trust-trading scam site  Please do not send anything here || need some help my tx status pending since 14 hrs what should I do ? || Sign and broadcast the transaction again (with the same nonce)  but with a higher gas price.  IF the transaction is to this address  sign a transaction to yourself with the same nonce but with a higher gas price. || mentioned the link pls || If it is still pending due to low gas I would broadcast a new transaction to replace it if you sent it to this address here so the pending will fail because this address is a scam - I'd make a new transaction to another wallet OF YOUR OWN that would send the total balance of the asset that is still pending to another wallet (a wallet of your own that is) using a high gas limit - that will move the asset to your other wallet not leaving enough for the pending transaction to complete - because any funds sent to this address are LOST FOREVER to you || I am not sending to this address I am sending to other address using GWI4 and Gas Price 54000 but tx status still pending 14 hrs passed. Should I need to replace it ? || 4 Gwei is pretty low  but it should eventually complete unless you replace the transaction using the same nonce - I'm not exactly certain how to do that - i've seen it listed in the comments before. Don't trust anyone who offers to help you by email - those are scammers. Google will probably help there - or you could just let it ride - it will eventually either fail or succeed - if it fails  try again with higher gwei || but no idea how much it takes time already 14hrs passed I need this tx done urgent. || The top comment on this transaction: 0x8d12a197cb00d4747a1fe03395095ce2a5cc6819  tells how to replace a pending transaction || Ah - you'll probably want to replace the transaction - now if you are sending the entire balance of that particular asset or at least enough that there will less than the pending transaction left in the account  then you could make a new transaction and maybe try 40gwei (or 10 or 12 - a high gwei will get'er done quick) and the new transaction will complete quickly - if there is still enough left the old transaction may still complete too - using the same nonce would avoid that dilemma but as I said  I'm not sure how to do that right off hand..
